New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 12 月 11 日星期三 01:15:02 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Last of big stud rams up for sale at Gisborne’s Matawhero yards https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/last-of-big-stud-rams-up-for-sale-at-gisbornes-matawhero-yards/S47C6QDPDRDMXH2H6YX43XLGOY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/last-of-big-stud-rams-up-for-sale-at-gisbornes-matawhero-yards/S47C6QDPDRDMXH2H6YX43XLGOY/ Murray RobertsonTe Ruanui Poll Dorsets to put up 120 of their rams for sale in last big sale for 2024 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 01:06:34 +0000 The last of the district's big stud ram sales is being held at Matawhero Saleyards on Friday afternoon. Craig and Yvonne Brownlie are putting up their Poll Dorsets, Poll/Tex and Suffolks, following on from last week's Mangahauhau offering (pictured). Photo / Murray Robertson
Craggy Range and volunteers pack 3900 gifts for local families https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/craggy-range-and-volunteers-pack-3900-gifts-for-local-families/V7UUEF2H2NAARNSQVD7MKR24WE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/craggy-range-and-volunteers-pack-3900-gifts-for-local-families/V7UUEF2H2NAARNSQVD7MKR24WE/ Michaela GowerGifts focus on STEM learning, fun and practical items for children in need this Christmas. Wed, 11 Dec 2024 01:02:32 +0000 Craggy Range and the 2024 Children’s Christmas Foundation packed 3900 Santa sacks with 200 volunteers. Photo / Richard Brimer
